useCases: Для привычек: I play every day
Для расписаний: The train leaves at 5

formulas.affirmative: I/you/we/they + V1 (I play, I go) | he/she/it + V1+s/es (he plays, he goes)
formulas.negative: I/you/we/they + don't + V1 (don't play/go) | he/she/it + doesn't + V1 (doesn't play/go)
formulas.question: Do + I/you/we/they + V1? (Do you play/go?) | Does + he/she/it + V1? (Does he play/go?)
formulas.shortAnswers: Yes, I do. / No, I don't. | Yes, he does. / No, he doesn't.

examples.en: I play Minecraft every day.
examples.ru: Я играю в Майнкрафт каждый день.

examples.en: She likes pizza.
We go to school on Mondays.
examples.ru: Мы ходим в школу по понедельникам.

examples.en: He doesn't watch TV.
Do they play football?

useCases: Для завершённых действий: I played yesterday

formulas.question: Did + подлежащее + V1?
formulas.shortAnswers: Yes, I did. / No, I didn't.

examples.en: I played Minecraft yesterday.
She went to school last Monday.
examples.ru: Она пошла в школу в прошлый понедельник.

examples.en: We didn't watch TV.
Did they win the game?

useCases: Для предсказаний: It will rain tomorrow

formulas.question: Will + подлежащее + V1? (Will you play/go?)
formulas.shortAnswers: Yes, I will. / No, I won't.

examples.en: I will play Minecraft tomorrow.
examples.ru: Я буду играть в Майнкрафт завтра.

examples.en: She won't go to school on Sunday.
examples.ru: Она не пойдёт в школу в воскресенье.

examples.en: Will they win the game?

formulas.affirmative: I + am + V-ing (am playing/going) | he/she/it + is + V-ing (is playing/going) | you/we/they + are + V-ing (are playing/going)
formulas.negative: I'm not + V-ing (am not playing/going) | he/she/it + isn't + V-ing (isn't playing/going) | you/we/they + aren't + V-ing (aren't playing/going)
formulas.question: Am I + V-ing? (Am I playing?) | Is he/she/it + V-ing? (Is he playing?) | Are you/we/they + V-ing? (Are you playing?)
formulas.shortAnswers: Yes, I am. / No, I'm not. | Yes, he is. / No, he isn't.

examples.en: I am playing Minecraft now.
She is watching TV at the moment.
They aren't studying.
Are you playing games?

useCases: Для действий в конкретный момент прошлого

formulas.affirmative: I/he/she/it + was + V-ing (was playing/going) | you/we/they + were + V-ing (were playing/going)
formulas.negative: I/he/she/it + wasn't + V-ing (wasn't playing/going) | you/we/they + weren't + V-ing (weren't playing/going)
formulas.question: Was I/he/she/it + V-ing? (Was he playing?) | Were you/we/they + V-ing? (Were you playing?)
formulas.shortAnswers: Yes, I was. / No, I wasn't.

examples.en: I was playing Minecraft at 5 pm.
examples.ru: Я играл в Майнкрафт в 5 вечера.

examples.en: She was watching TV when I called.
examples.ru: Она смотрела телевизор, когда я позвонил.

examples.en: They weren't studying.
Were you playing games?

useCases: Для действий в конкретный момент будущего

formulas.affirmative: Все + will be + V-ing (will be playing/going)
formulas.negative: Все + won't be + V-ing (won't be playing/going)
formulas.question: Will + подлежащее + be + V-ing? (Will you be playing?)
formulas.shortAnswers: Yes, I will. / No, I won't.

examples.en: I will be playing Minecraft at 5 pm tomorrow.
examples.ru: Я буду играть в Майнкрафт завтра в 5 вечера.

examples.en: She will be waiting for you.

formulas.affirmative: I/you/we/they + have + V3 (have played/gone) | he/she/it + has + V3 (has played/gone)
formulas.negative: I/you/we/they + haven't + V3 (haven't played/gone) | he/she/it + hasn't + V3 (hasn't played/gone)
formulas.question: Have + I/you/we/they + V3? (Have you played/gone?) | Has + he/she/it + V3? (Has he played/gone?)
formulas.shortAnswers: Yes, I have. / No, I haven't. | Yes, he has. / No, he hasn't.

examples.en: I have played Minecraft before.
She has just finished homework.
They haven't won yet.
Have you ever been to London?

useCases: Для действий, завершившихся до другого прошлого

formulas.question: Had + подлежащее + V3? (Had you played/gone?)
formulas.shortAnswers: Yes, I had. / No, I hadn't.

examples.en: I had finished homework before dinner.
She had never played Minecraft before.
examples.ru: Она никогда раньше не играла в Майнкрафт.

useCases: Для действий, завершившихся к моменту в будущем

formulas.affirmative: Все + will have + V3 (will have played/gone)
formulas.negative: Все + won't have + V3 (won't have played/gone)
formulas.question: Will + подлежащее + have + V3? (Will you have played/gone?)
formulas.shortAnswers: Yes, I will. / No, I won't.

examples.en: I will have finished homework by 8 pm.
She will have left before you arrive.

useCases: Для действий, начавшихся в прошлом и продолжающихся сейчас

formulas.affirmative: I/you/we/they + have been + V-ing | he/she/it + has been + V-ing
formulas.negative: I/you/we/they + haven't been + V-ing | he/she/it + hasn't been + V-ing
formulas.question: Have + I/you/we/they + been + V-ing? | Has + he/she/it + been + V-ing?
formulas.shortAnswers: Yes, I have. / No, I haven't. | Yes, he has. / No, he hasn't.

examples.en: I have been playing Minecraft for 2 hours.
examples.ru: Я играю в Майнкрафт уже 2 часа.

examples.en: She has been studying since morning.

useCases: Для действий, длившихся до другого момента в прошлом

formulas.affirmative: Все + had been + V-ing (had been playing/going)
formulas.negative: Все + hadn't been + V-ing (hadn't been playing/going)
formulas.question: Had + подлежащее + been + V-ing? (Had you been playing?)
formulas.shortAnswers: Yes, I had. / No, I hadn't.

examples.en: I had been playing for 2 hours before she came.
examples.ru: Я играл 2 часа, прежде чем она пришла.

useCases: Для действий, которые будут длиться к моменту в будущем

formulas.affirmative: Все + will have been + V-ing (will have been playing/going)
formulas.negative: Все + won't have been + V-ing (won't have been playing/going)
formulas.question: Will + подлежащее + have been + V-ing? (Will you have been playing?)
formulas.shortAnswers: Yes, I will. / No, I won't.

examples.en: I will have been playing for 2 hours by 5 pm.
examples.ru: Я буду играть уже 2 часа к 5 вечера.
